ISSUE.TITLE: client is newer than server (client API version: 1.26, server API version: 1.24)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Quote of the "full" error log in the build: `ERROR: Error response from daemon: client is newer than server (client API version: 1.26, server API version: 1.24)` Infrastructure is on Rancher with [CoreOS Stable](https://coreos.com/releases/) currently running docker version `1.12.6`. Where do I start to dig deeper as to why this error happens?
